title: FSU finance expert: Fed had to respond to high inflation - Florida State News
content: FSU finance expert: Fed had to respond to high inflation  Florida State News
description: Soaring inflation and its threat to the U.S. economy gave the Federal Reserve no choice but to raise interest rates this week and to signal further increases in the coming months, said William Christiansen, longtime chair of the finance department in Florida State University’s College of Business. “There’s pretty much unanimous agreement that they have […]
